'''Lonely Mountain''' can refer to: 
==Middle-earth==
* The '''[[Lonely Mountain]]''', also called [[Lonely Mountain|Erebor]], the lair of [[Smaug]] in late [[Third Age]]
==Adaptations==
===Popular culture===
* [[The Lonely Mountain Band]], a folk music band inspired by [[J.R.R. Tolkien]] 
===Games===
* ''[[The Lonely Mountain]]'', a [[1984]] board game from [[Iron Crown Enterprises]]
